## Overview

This is a starter RMarkdown for RStudio. Activate the `lab5-r-stub` conda environment before opening in RStudio so it uses the environment's R.

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

### Exercise

1. Load the `SingleCellExperiment` package and inspect a small example dataset.

```{r}
library(SingleCellExperiment)
# Example: create a tiny SingleCellExperiment
counts <- matrix(rpois(200, lambda=5), ncol=10)
colnames(counts) <- paste0("Cell", 1:10)
rownames(counts) <- paste0("Gene", 1:20)
 sce <- SingleCellExperiment::SingleCellExperiment(assays = list(counts = counts))
 sce
```
